Chronicle newspaper reported during the weekend that Bulawayo 's unemployment levels are too high compared to other areas , we believe this was a man made problem for Mthwakazians , when Zimbabwe got its independence in April 18 1980 Bulawayo was the hub of industry not only for Zimbabwe but for the greater SADC and Zimbabwe was a bread basket of Africa before it got its current status of being the begging or empty basket of Africa .
